episodes.title: Faladev #30 | The Importance of Open Source Contribution
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, João Pedro, Diego Haz, and Bruno Lemos
episodes.description:
In this episode of Faladev, Diego Fernandes joins João Pedro Schmitz, Bruno Lemos, and Diego Haz to discuss the importance of open-source contribution and the challenges within the community.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast.

episodes.title: Faladev #29 | Two Different Perspectives on the Table: A Conversation about FP and OOP

episodes.description:
Diego and Dani host Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda at the Faladev table to discuss functional programming and object-oriented programming.

episodes.title: Faladev #28 | Behind Barriers and Proposed Solutions by Microservices
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Wesley Williams, and Lucas Santos
episodes.description:
Developers Wesley Williams and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev episode to have a conversation about what microservices are and the challenges and barriers of their application.

In this edition, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation by raising relevant topics and questions on the subject.

episodes.description:
Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista welcomed Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas to have a chat about modern development architectures applied in the tech industry.

episodes.title: Faladev #26 | Special: Exclusive Interview with José Valim, Creator of the Elixir Language
episodes.description:
In this special end-of-season episode, we had the opportunity to have a conversation with José Valim, a Brazilian developer who created the Elixir programming language — used internationally in various technologies, including Discord and Pinterest.

The topic of the week revolved around various processes involved in creating a new language that aims to be an efficient alternative in the technology market.

In addition to all of this, Valim could talk about a lot of code and his journey and experience in creating an active community behind open source.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming orbit.

Faladev is a Rocketseat original podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

episodes.title: Faladev #25 | What is UX/UI?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Tiago Luchtenberg, and Thainan Librelon
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming orbit.

Faladev is a Rocketseat original podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

In this episode, Diego Fernandes joins Thainan Librelon and Tiago Luchtenberg to discuss: Can developers do the work of UI/UX, what's the impact? When is the ideal time to have specialized people in UX and UI? And after all, what is UI and what is UX?

episodes.title: Faladev #24 | How to Become a Development Leader?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, João Paulo, and Cleiton Souza
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming orbit.

Faladev is a Rocketseat original podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

In this episode, Diego Fernandes joins Cleiton Souza and João Paulo de Magalhães to discuss leadership, considering professional, technical, and even emotional aspects. What does it involve to be a development leader? After all, what is a development leader?

episodes.title: FalaDev #23 | What Do Communities Have to Do with Technology?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Isabela Castilho, and João Inácio
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week, we gather three technology professionals to discuss everything that revolves around the programming orbit.

Faladev is a Rocketseat original podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

In this first episode of the new season, Diego Fernandes joins Isabela Castilho and João Inácio Neto (Biro) to discuss communities and the impact they have on devs' careers in pursuit of the next level. After all, what is a community and what does it have to do with technology?
